title: Himi 368
lyrics:
8 & 7 (loua)
1.
Mālō, Sīsū manukia!
Mālō, Tu’i Kaleli!
Na’a ke fu’u mamahi’ia,
Na’a ke to’o homau taute’i.
Sīsū ko ho’ feinga ia
‘Oku mau mo’ui ai;
Na’a ke ‘ave ‘emau hia;
Na’a ke vete ho kakai.
2.
Ko e Lami ‘a e ‘Otua
Na’a ne tokonaki mai,
Ke ke fua ‘emau kovi;
Mo ke fai totongi ai.
‘Oku fakamolemole
Hia kotoa ‘a ho kakai
‘I ho ta’ata’a tapu,
Mo e hifo na’a ke fai.
3.
Mālō, Sīsū Lāngilangi,
Tu’i he kau ‘āngelo!
‘Oku nau hū atu ma’u pē
‘I he ‘aho mo e pō.
‘Oku ke ‘afio hena
‘I he nima to’
o
mata’u
‘O e Tamai Māfimafi,
Taupeupe atu fau.
4.
Mālō fau e taukapo’i
Kimautolu angahia!
Mālō ho’ afeitaulalo
He fa’ahinga malaʻia!
‘Oku ke ‘afio hena
Ke ke teu hamau tofi’a
Fai pē homau hūfekina,
Taki ki he monūʻia.
5.
‘Oku ‘ou ‘a e fakamālo,
‘Alo he ‘Otua ē;
Ke punou pē ‘i ho ‘ao
‘A e fa’ahinga fulipē.
Kau mai Hōsitē ‘o Langi!
Kāinga Selupimi, kau!
Hiva’aki hotau Sīsū;
Kailangaki hotau Hau.*
